Description: Fire & Forget Final Assault - chased fly, shoot at flying the most advanced tanks! In a world ravaged by nuclear war, where law and order has remained in the distant past, the terrorist group is trying to strike the final blow, which can lead to a complete loss of what's left of humanity. And only you will be able to break down a group of terrorists! Fire & Forget it shuternyh game in which you control a flying bronemobilem equipped with a deadly weapon. Destroy dozens of enemies and obstacles in each level, you configure the car of your choice. The game contains 10 levels in the devastated post-apocalyptic world and 3 levels of difficulty.
